## MathUtils.interpolateAnglesDeg() function

Interpolate linearly between two angles given in degrees.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function interpolateAnglesDeg(p0: number, p1: number, t: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  p0 | number | Angle from in degrees |
|  p1 | number | Angle to in degrees |
|  t | number | Interpolation factor (alpha), in range <code>0-1</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
